sentences.en: He attacks your purity with lust, and he attacks your serenity with worry.
sentences.cn: 他攻击欲望你的纯度，他用焦虑攻击你的宁平静。

sentences.en: He thought of her serenity as a foil for his intemperance.
sentences.cn: 在他看来，她的平静反衬出了他的放纵。

sentences.en: Her face had an expression of absolute serenity.
sentences.cn: 她脸上带着极为平静的表情.

sentences.en: Her face, though sad, still evoked a feeling of serenity.
sentences.cn: 她的脸色虽然悲伤, 但仍使人感觉安详.

sentences.en: His serenity was but the array of wild flowers niched in his ruin.
sentences.cn: 其实,他的安祥只是点缀在他这片废墟上的几朵野花而已.

sentences.en: I was in a state of physical serenity.
It was his serenity that stoked the flames.
sentences.cn: 他心平气和,反而把火焰拔得更旺了.

sentences.en: It was their serenity which galled her most.
sentences.cn: 最让她恼怒的是他们的平静。

sentences.en: Newton Arvin has pointed out that Emerson had to struggle toward serenity.
sentences.cn: 牛顿·阿尔文指出爱默生不得不奋力拼搏才得以达到清静境界.

sentences.en: She escaped to the comparative serenity of the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 她逃到相对安静的厨房里.

sentences.en: She has a Madonna - like serenity.
sentences.cn: 她有圣母画像一样的平和.

sentences.en: The artist had caught, with remarkable fidelity, Ruth's graceful beauty and serenity.
sentences.cn: 艺术家以惊人的精确性抓住了露丝优雅的面貌与安详的神态.

sentences.en: The old man died with serenity.
The old man said with all his serenity.
To cast it off might be to regain serenity.
sentences.cn: 把它抛开,可以使心神重归平静.

sentences.en: We had to project serenity and strength and purpose.
sentences.cn: 我们必须表现出镇静,力量和具有目的性.

words.tran_cn: 平静的；安详的；清澈的；晴朗的
平静，宁静；晴朗，风和日丽

trans.tran_cn: 安详，宁静，尊贵的阁下，平静
